long_description: The lightweight REI Travel Sack Sleeping Bag is made for hostelling, summer camping, RVs and other warm-weather outings. As a bonus, you can use it as a liner inside another bag for ultra warmth. Polyester synthetic fill offers all-conditions warmth down to about 55degF. Roomy mummy shape provides space to move around. Two-way zip lets you open the bag fully for use as a quilt or unzips at the bottom for ventilation. Differentiated drawcords (1 round, 1 flat) let you adjust hood and neck easily in the dark. Inner pocket is handy to stow a phone, glasses, flashlight or other essentials. Polyester shell is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. The REI Travel Sack Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: The lightweight REI Travel Sack Sleeping Bag is made for hostelling, summer camping, RVs and other warm-weather outings. As a bonus, you can use it as a liner inside another bag for ultra warmth.
